articles.title: Iran state TV says a stampede erupts at funeral procession for general slain in US airstrike, killing some mourners

articles.content:
TEHRAN, Iran Iran state TV says a stampede erupts at funeral procession for general slain in US airstrike, killing some mourners.

articles.author: Adil Jawad | AP
articles.title: Pakistani writer says his novel on ex-dictator confiscated
articles.description: A prominent Pakistani novelist and New York Times columnist says security agents raided the offices of his publisher and confiscated all the copies of his book about the country's former military dictator Ziaul Haq
articles.content:
Hanif, whose acclaimed A Case of Exploding Mangoes is a parody about the former dictator, killed in a plane crash in 1988, blamed the Pakistani spy agency, the Inter-Services Intelligence or ISI, for the raid.
However, an official at the agency described Han… [+2123 chars]
